name: Serpent of Shifting Scales
Dynamic Pricing Algorithm
image_description: A cybernetic serpent with scales displaying real-time price fluctuations
card_text: Whenever market conditions change, adjust product pricing. Scry 1 after each pricing shift
flavor_text: Gold is never static - neither are my calculations!

name: Spectral Showroom Owl
AR Product Preview
image_description: A translucent owl projecting holographic product visualizations
card_text: Tap: Create a 3D illusionary projection of target product in the user's environment
flavor_text: See beyond the veil of space and time!

name: Goblin Cart Retriever
Abandoned Cart Recovery
image_description: A wiry goblin dragging overflowing shopping carts through digital portals
card_text: Haste. When this enters battlefield, return target abandoned cart to its owner's hand

name: Fae Review Harvester
User-Generated Content Curation
image_description: A tiny winged fae carrying scrolls of customer reviews and photos
card_text: Flying. Whenever a customer leaves a review, create a 1/1 Photo Evidence token

name: Lightning-Flash Vendor
Flash Sale System
image_description: A crackling humanoid stormcloud holding an hourglass filled with lightning
card_text: Create X temporary duplicate product listings at X-1% cost where X is your devotion to red

name: Crossell Chimera
Intelligent Product Bundling
image_description: A three-headed beast combining unrelated items into perfect packages
card_text: When this enters battlefield, reveal cards from top of library until you reveal three artifacts. Put them into play tapped
flavor_text: You need this... and this... and especially THIS!

name: Stockwatch Phoenix
Back-in-Stock Alerts
image_description: A flaming bird circling high above warehouse inventory racks
card_text: Flying, vigilance. When monitored product becomes available, return Stockwatch Phoenix from graveyard to hand

name: Loyalty Hoard Dragon
Reward Program System
image_description: A massive dragon sleeping on a mountain of loyalty point tokens
card_text: Flying. Whenever a customer makes a purchase, put a +1/+1 counter on Loyalty Hoard Dragon. Remove 3 counters: Draw a card
flavor_text: My treasures grow with your devotion
